creator: heita@mb.infoweb.ne.jp
text:
log4j now isn't supporsed to work on non-SUN jre because it assumes 
that jre has sun.misc.InvalidJarIndexException. Actually, it didn't work
on IBM jre 1.2.2.

helpers.Loader uses "sun.misc.InvalidJarIndexException" explicitly, but
as described in http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/faq/faq-sun-packages.html,
sun.* packages are not common public classes and some jre implementations
might not have it.

This bug seems to be introduced by the fix that an aplet fails to search
default log4j config file in 1.1beta5.

creator: bugzilla@apache.org
text: Indded. This is fixed in log4j 1.1b6.
